title: ‘Hey Sonos’: Smart speaker maker is launching its own version of Siri
content:
Forget Alexa and Google Assistant, as Sonos is preparing to announce its proprietary voice assistant that will be introduced within the next few weeks. It will let customers control music on the company’s home audio platform.

more…

The post ‘Hey Sonos’: Smart speaker maker is launching its own version of Siri appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Sonos is preparing to announce its proprietary voice assistant that will be introduced within the next few weeks
